title: Limitations
text:
The output of the model seems to be inconsistent, given the same prompts, the final image of the cat looks significantly varied in successive iterations.

Several trials were needed in order to figure out the optimal prompt for the desired image. It was also quite unclear how the prompt generation weighted the keywords. For instance, given the same prompts, the first output was focused on the cat as a main subject, and did not emphasize on generating the technology aspect for the background.
